name: VakilHelp
tag_list: law, legal, legal-services, online-legal-services, lawyers-directory, law-firm-directory, law-firm-network
overview:
Leveraging Technology to Deliver Legal Services.

VakilHelp brings a new dimension to the changing legal profession..

VakilHelp is India’s first and unique online delivery platform of legal services which combines innovative easy-to-use technology with personalized service directly from qualified independent advocates and law firms. It is the online legal destination for consumers, small business, attorneys, corporations, and anyone in need of legal products or services.

With a mission to set new standards of integrity, transparency, convenience and service in an industry not known for good customer care, the VakilHelp technology will make legal protection more accessible and affordable for everyone.

Leading Advocates and Young Legal Experts who are new breed of thought leaders, along with veteran practitioners and winners in diverse practice areas and Jurisdictions will together power the real time Q&A and all other online solutions and services provided through this website.

VakilHelp.com aspires to be a premier online legal destination for small businesses and consumers.
